description: RouteIngressCondition contains details for the current condition of this route on a particular router.

message.description: Human readable message indicating details about last transition.

reason.description: (brief) reason for the condition's last transition, and is usually a machine and human readable constant

status.description: Status is the status of the condition. Can be True, False, Unknown.

type.description: Type is the type of the condition. Currently only Ready.
